committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to reinstate the national trigger provisions which were part of the extended unemployment compensation program before they were repealed by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981 to repeal the elimination of the national trigger provisions which were part of the extended unemployment compensation program. Provides that the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 shall be applied as if such elimination had not been enacted.

titles.title: A bill to reinstate the national trigger provisions which were part of the extended unemployment compensation program before they were repealed by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.
